summary.span: 类是将 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 类型映射为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型的抽象类。

span.span: The class is an abstract class for mapping XML Schema definition language (XSD) types to Common Language Runtime (CLR) types.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，根据内置或用户定义的简单类型验证指定的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, validates the specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type.

returns.span: ，它可以被安全地强制转换为由 属性返回的类型。

span.span: An that can be cast safely to the type returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法验证`string`指定根据内置或用户定义的简单类型。The method validates the `string` specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type. 例如，如果此表示类型 xs: date，则实例返回。For example, if this represents the type xs:date, then an instance of is returned. 以下是期间所执行的步骤方法的验证过程。The following are the steps performed during the method's validation process. 1. 将转换为指定的值`string`到其相应的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型。Convert the value specified as a `string` to its corresponding Common Language Runtime (CLR) type. 2. 验证值不违反的简单类型定义的任何方面。Verify that the value does not violate any facets defined for the simple type. 然后返回的已转换的值为并且可以安全地强制转换返回的类型为属性。The converted value is then returned as an and can be cast safely to the type returned by the property. 当对象表示列表类型，输入`string`值转换为一个或多个对象的列表。When the object represents a list type, the input `string` value is converted to a list of one or more objects. 当对象表示列表类型，尝试解析输入的值作为联合的成员类型。When the object represents a list type, an attempt is made to parse the input value as a member type of the union. 如果尝试分析失败，然后尝试并集的下一个成员进行转换，直到分析成功或有其他要分析的成员类型。If the parse attempt fails, then the conversion is attempted with the next member of the union until the parse is successful or there are no other member types to parse. 如果分析失败，将引发异常。If the parse is unsuccessful, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例检索`LotteryNumber`example.xsd 文件作为从简单类型然后验证是否`string`的值`5`使用方法。The following example retrieves the `LotteryNumber` simple type from the example.xsd file as an and then validates the `string` value of `5` using the method. [!code-cpp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/CPP/datatype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/CS/datatype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/VB/datatype.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件用于前面的代码示例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

exception.span: 输入值不是该 W3C XML 架构类型的有效实例。

span.span: The input value is not a valid instance of this W3C XML Schema type.
The value to parse cannot be .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取在 WWW 联合会 (W3C) XML 1.0 规范中指定的 的类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type for the as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 1.0 specification.
An value for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许`string`CDATA 节类型作为特定 XML 类型，例如，读取。Allows the `string` to be read as a particular XML type, for example, a CDATA section type. 下表显示了令牌的类型。The following table shows the token types. |XmlTokenizedTypeXmlTokenizedType|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`CDATA`|CDATA 类型CDATA type| |`ID`|ID 类型ID type| |`IDREF`|IDREF 类型IDREF type| |`IDREFS`|IDREFS 类型IDREFS type| |`ENTITY`|实体类型ENTITY type| |`ENTITIES`|实体类型ENTITIES type| |`NMTOKEN`|NMTOKEN 类型NMTOKEN type| |`NMTOKENS`|NMTOKENS 类型NMTOKENS type| |`NOTATION`|NOTATION 类型NOTATION type| |`ENUMERATION`|枚举类型ENUMERATION type| |`QName`|QName 类型QName type| |`NCName`|NCName 类型NCName type| |`None`|没有类型No type|

summary.span: 获取简单类型的 值。

span.span: Gets the value for the simple type.
The value for the simple type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如不表示 xs: entities、 xs: nmtokens 和 xs: idrefs 类型的 W3C XML 架构列表枚举。W3C XML Schema list types such as xs:ENTITIES, xs:NMTOKENS and xs:IDREFS are not represented by the enumeration. 而是由表示xs:ENTITY、 xs: nmtoken 和 xs: idref 类型使用值的属性对象设置为。Instead they are represented by the values for the xs:ENTITY, xs:NMTOKEN and xs:IDREF types with the property of the object set to . > [!NOTE] > 不表示 xs:anySimpleType 和 xs: anytype 类型枚举。Both the xs:anySimpleType and xs:anyType types are not represented by enumeration. 这些都包含在对象使用其值是为 xs:anySimpleType 或为 xs: anytype。These are represented in an object with an whose value is for xs:anySimpleType or for xs:anyType. ## Examples 有关的示例属性，请参阅。For an example of the property, see .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取项的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the Common Language Runtime (CLR) type of the item.

value.span: 项的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型。

span.span: The Common Language Runtime (CLR) type of the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取的项的 CLR 类型。The property gets the CLR type of the item. 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`必须的默认情况下。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是，可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`，如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 有关的示例属性，请参阅。For an example of the property, see .
